title: Apple macOS IOGraphics IDState Out-Of-Bounds Read Information Disclosure Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to disclose sensitive information on vulnerable installations of Apple macOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of the IOGraphics kext. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of user-supplied data, which can result in a read past the end of an allocated buffer. An attacker can leverage this in conjunction with other vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code under the context of the kernel.
addtionnal_details: Apple has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT208937
timeline:
2018-05-18 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2018-07-10 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2018-07-10 - Advisory Updated
